author: jhgoh
body:
The PseudoTopProducer is re-implemented to be synchronized to the LHCTOPWG definition.
Especially the lepton + jet channel is updated to follow the recommendation.

Details on the changes are presented in the TopModGen meeting in the Feb. 2
https://indico.cern.ch/event/492207/contribution/4/attachments/1221424/1785928/2016.02.02_PseudoTop_devleopment.pdf

This PR also includes a bugfix to avoid crash when storing genJet constituents, temporary ghost B hadrons should not be included in the output genJet object.
title: Synchronize pseudo top definition with LHCTOPWG
